script-type.name: variant-string-id
script-type.blurb: A predefined value which can refer to an object variant or to an animation name.

description.p: Variant IDs are predefined values that can be used to specify an object variation, when creating objects, or an animation name, when working with "device machines."
You may use any of the values below, or you may use the value none to use the default ID for the object in question.

description.p: The list of variant IDs available to Megalo is defined in a *.MAP file's msit tag. Objects can define named variants in their hlmt tags, while model animation data (including named animations) is defined in jmad tags.
